name: Rivers of Blood
description:
Rivers of Blood is a third-person, single-player, action-adventure platformer.

You'll control a girl who runs through a scenario in the style of classic platform games. On your way there will be a multitude of obstacles, enemy, jumps and deadly traps that you will have to jump at the right time to continue your race the and return to the real world.

Discover the limits of your patience and test your abilities - how far will you be able to go without dying in the attempt?

Bloody and visceral game.
